```{r}
library("altair")

vega_data <- import_vega_data()

chart <- 
  alt$Chart(r_to_py(vega_data$cars()))$
  encode(
    x = "Horsepower:Q",
    y = "Miles_per_Gallon:Q",
    color = "Origin:N"
  )$
  mark_point()
```
